scripts.start: set NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.start:all: set NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation && concurrently "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend start" "npm --prefix admin-frontend start"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:admin
scripts.dev: set NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
